fields.description: This is a list of the current Arch Linux Developers. They maintain the [core] and [extra] package repositories in addition to doing any other developer duties.
fields.name: Developers

fields.description: Here are all your friendly Arch Linux Package Maintainers who are in charge of the Archlinux's official repositories (aside from [core] / [core-testing].
fields.name: Package Maintainers

fields.description: Below you can find a list of ex-developers (aka project fellows). These folks helped make Arch what it is today. Thanks!
fields.name: Developer Fellows

fields.description: Below you can find a list of ex-package maintainers (aka fellows). These folks helped make Arch what it is today. Thanks!
fields.name: Package Maintainer Fellows

fields.description: These are the unheralded people that keep things running behind the scenes. Forum moderators, wiki admins, IRC moderators, mirror maintenance, and everything else that keeps a Linux distro running smoothly.
fields.name: Support Staff
